casebody.data:
SANDRA SALMON v. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC HEALTH AND ADDICTION SERVICES The Supreme Court docket number is SC 16400X01. Donna Decker Morris, in support of the petition. Edward F. Osswalt, assistant attorney general, in opposition. Decided October 12, 2000

VERTEFEUILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
